signals.description: Audio phoneme timing inconsistent with mouth motion across sampled frames.
Face region exhibits frame-to-frame instability inconsistent with camera motion.

limits: Assessment is probabilistic; no ground-truth authenticity claim is made.
Re-encoding and low light can reduce signal reliability.
optional_next_steps: If stakes are high, consider obtaining the original capture file or a signed source copy.

invariants: Artifact density affects signal availability and uncertainty, not outcome authority.
Artifact density may adjust quality and confidence metrics but must never directly influence traffic-light thresholds or force an outcome.
